coreAttributes.name: arcane lightning ring
coreAttributes.description: Arthur was able to extract the remaining power of the arcane lightning globe into a smaller crystal, which has been fitted onto this ring. Just like its previous iteration, this tiny crystal globe quickly fills with a crackling, swirling maelstrom of arcane lightning when equipped.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Fire a bolt of arcane lightning at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on [npc.her] arcane lightning ring and [npc.verb(prepare)] to unleash its power.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Harnessing the power of the arcane lightning ring, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning directly at [npc2.name]!

#IF(npc.isFeral()) Using the power of the arcane lightning ring, [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] a dazzling strike of arcane lightning directly at [npc2.name]! #ELSE Using the power of the arcane lightning ring, [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] a dazzling strike of arcane lightning directly at [npc2.name]! #ENDIF

#IF(npc.isFeral()) A bright pink flash of arcane lightning streaks out from [npc.namePos] arcane lightning ring, hitting [npc2.name] directly in the chest! #ELSE A bright pink flash of arcane lightning streaks out from [npc.namePos] outstretched [npc.hand], hitting [npc2.name] directly in the chest! #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: Harnessing the power of the arcane lightning ring, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.name]!
Launching a dazzling strike of arcane lightning at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(unleash)] a blast of bright pink lightning at [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
